issue.title: Cannot log in to www.artisanalmustard.example.com!
issue.body:
URL: www.artisanalmustard.example.com
Browser / Version: Firefox 61.0
Operating System: Mac OS X 10.13
Problem type: Log in is broken

Steps to Reproduce

    Navigate to: www.artisanalmustard.example.com
Try to log in

Expected Behavior:
successful login followed by copious mustardy goodness

Actual Behavior:
no mustard for you

body.from:
URL: www.example.com
Browser / Version: Firefox 61.0
Operating System: Mac OS X 10.13
Problem type: Text is not visible

Steps to Reproduce

    Navigate to: www.example.com
    throw webhooks at me

Expected Behavior:
flying webhooks

Actual Behavior:
splat
